title: PLEASE RIOT! GIVE US MORE GAME MODES!!!!
body:
Honestly Riot,

We love you and your game but seriously, you CAN afford to give us permanent  Twisted Treeline Servers and even ranked! 

Give us Crystal Scar! Give us more ways to play your delightful game! Why must Australia and New Zealand always be behind the rest of the world!

We love you Riot but be good to us!

replies.body:
Hey there,

The reason we don't currently have these queues enabled fulltime is that expansion of the TT queue would reduce the health of TT, leading to longer queues and eventually less people playing the mode. The same can be said for the Crystal Scar (Dominion).

See Sephyre's comment [here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZzQR1haM-queue-schedule-updated?comment=00050000) regarding this.

> [{quoted}](name=Sephyre,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZzQR1haM,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2015-09-23T04:11:22.125+0000)
>
> We regularly evaluate whether we can have it, as we do for all of our queues. This means evaluating having queues on a limited basis, permanent basis, etc.
> 
> I hear you that it would be cool to have it, I know I would be all over it, but it's just about what the numbers make sense to do.
> 
> If we grow to the point of being able to have Ranked TT open, boards will be the first place the news will be posted.

The current queue schedule is as follows

**On all the time:**

* Summoner's Rift 5v5 Normal Blind Pick
* Summoner's Rift 5v5 Ranked Draft Pick
* ARAM
* Co-op vs AI Summoner's Rift (intro/beginner/intermediate)

**Twisted Treeline:**

* Thursday: 3:00pm - 1:00am AEDT
* Friday: 3:00pm - 1:00am AEDT
* Saturday: 3:00pm - 1:00am AEDT

Ever stop to think why the "numbers" are down on such maps as TT?
Because League doesn't support it in the way it does Summoners Rift. Every thing about the game of League is revolved around Summoners Rift. Balancing, Champions, meta, Competitive play, even item builds! (granted TT does have a few item exceptions, but they're bascially just a remix of summoner items)
Heck, the way Rito is being run now, they don't want to support any other gamemodes, with the complete axing of Dominion. Just you watch, TT will be next.

TBH I've always wanted a 1vs1 playlist and possibly 1vs1 ranked. I think its something that League could take a leaf out of smite for, although it would have the same affect of splitting player population.

>
